name: Googun
description:
A physics based puzzle-platformer. Combine different types of goo!

CONTROLS:

A/D - move

SPACE - jump

RMB - collect goo

LMB - shoot goo

Q/E or Scrollwheel - switch types of goo

R - restart level

END - skip level

Designed and developed by Ivan Pensionerov

Muisc: Stairway - Patrick Patrikios
